issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Buran on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Semi-circular crown cap, three round medal-lions above diadem; wing above crown cap to the left and right, above this crescent and covered korymbos; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders, pointing upwards; two rows of pendilia hanging from the diadem visible on the left side, the lower end of another one on the right; neck-line of tunica edged with a double row of pearls; crescent on left shoulder, both shoulders decorated with crescent and stars; star in upper left and right field; crescent and star at 3 h, 6 h and 9 h; double dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 2 h l. i. bwl’n, 11 h l. o. GDH/’pzwt’| Būrān xwarrah abzūd| “Buran, she increased the glory”
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of three elements, altar shaft, to the left and the right of the shaft ribbons hanging downwards; four altar slabs; altar flames rendered as four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; star to left of altar flames, crescent to the right; to the left and the right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Ardashir III, holding sword with both hands, right hand above left hand, both figures frontal; regnal year at 9 h; ; crescent at 3 h, 6 h 9 h and 12 h; dotted border
